input.description:
job ID
ID of the job.

job run ID [Optional]
In case the job ran, this input parameter shall contain the run ID for the same.

schedule ID [Optional]
If the job has a schedule defined then this input contains the schedule ID.

change ID
Change ID assigned to the job.

task ID
Task ID assigned to the job.

status
status contains the status code of the job run.
Allowed values: 0 1 2 3 4 5

status message [Optional]
status message of job completion.

schedule time [Optional]
schedule time of the job run.
Syntax: EEE MMM dd HH:mm:ss z yyyy

end time [Optional]
end time of the job run.
Syntax: EEE MMM dd HH:mm:ss z yyyy

targets [Optional]
Comma separated list of failed target names.

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:variable name="string-val"> <xsl:value-of select="concat(//summary/text(), ' - ')" disable-output-escaping="no" /> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="'${status}'='0'"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Job completed Successfully</xsl:text> </xsl:when> <xsl:when test="'${status}'='1'"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Job Failed</xsl:text> </xsl:when> <xsl:when test="'${status}'='2'"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Job Canceled</xsl:text> </xsl:when> <xsl:when test="'${status}'='3'"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Job Aborted</xsl:text> </xsl:when> <xsl:when test="'${status}'='4'"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Job Deleted</xsl:text> </xsl:when> <xsl:when test="'${status}'='5'"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Job Schedule Expired</xsl:text> </xsl:when> </xsl:choose> </xsl:variable> <xsl:value-of select="substring($string-val, 1, 99)" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" cdata-section-elements="location" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <Tasks> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string-length(//Task) > 0"> <xsl:copy-of select="//Task" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise>${task}</xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </Tasks> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:if test="string-length(.)>0"> <xsl:call-template name="tokenize"> <xsl:with-param name="string" select="." /> </xsl:call-template> </xsl:if> </value> </xsl:template> <xsl:template name="tokenize"> <xsl:param name="string" /> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="contains($string, ',')"> <xsl:value-of select="substring-before($string, ',')" disable-output-escaping="no" /> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no"> </xsl:text> <xsl:call-template name="tokenize"> <xsl:with-param name="string" select="substring-after($string, ',')" /> </xsl:call-template> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:value-of select="$string" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" cdata-section-elements="location" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <Tasks> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string-length(//task) > 0"> <xsl:copy-of select="//task" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise>${task}</xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </Tasks> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Job run ID: ${job run ID}</xsl:text> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" cdata-section-elements="location" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <Tasks> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string-length(//task) > 0"> <xsl:copy-of select="//task" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise>${task}</xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </Tasks> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <Tasks> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string-length(//task) > 0"> <xsl:copy-of select="//task" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise>${task}</xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </Tasks> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="'${success status}'='success'"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">ITSM ticket updated successfully</xsl:text> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:value-of select="." disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string(.)!='success' and string(.)!='failure'"> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string(.)='true'"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">0</xsl:text> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">1</xsl:text> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string(.)='success'"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">0</xsl:text> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">1</xsl:text> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:variable name="string-val"> <xsl:value-of select="concat(//summary/text(), ' - ')" disable-output-escaping="no" /> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="'${status}'='0'"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Job completed Successfully</xsl:text> </xsl:when> <xsl:when test="'${status}'='1'"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Job Failed</xsl:text> </xsl:when> <xsl:when test="'${status}'='2'"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Job Canceled</xsl:text> </xsl:when> <xsl:when test="'${status}'='3'"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Job Aborted</xsl:text> </xsl:when> <xsl:when test="'${status}'='4'"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Job Deleted</xsl:text> </xsl:when> <xsl:when test="'${status}'='5'"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Job Schedule Expired</xsl:text> </xsl:when> </xsl:choose> </xsl:variable> <xsl:value-of select="substring($string-val, 1, 99)" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" cdata-section-elements="location" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <Tasks> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string-length(//Task) > 0"> <xsl:copy-of select="//Task" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise>${task}</xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </Tasks> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:if test="string-length(.)>0"> <xsl:call-template name="tokenize"> <xsl:with-param name="string" select="." /> </xsl:call-template> </xsl:if> </value> </xsl:template> <xsl:template name="tokenize"> <xsl:param name="string" /> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="contains($string, ',')"> <xsl:value-of select="substring-before($string, ',')" disable-output-escaping="no" /> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no"> </xsl:text> <xsl:call-template name="tokenize"> <xsl:with-param name="string" select="substring-after($string, ',')" /> </xsl:call-template> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:value-of select="$string" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Job run ID: ${job run ID}</xsl:text> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" cdata-section-elements="location" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <Tasks> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string-length(//task) > 0"> <xsl:copy-of select="//task" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise>${task}</xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </Tasks> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

input.value: EEE MMM dd HH:mm:ss zzz yyyy
EEE MMM dd HH:mm:ss zzz yyyy

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:variable name="string-val"> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="'${status}'='0'"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Job completed Successfully</xsl:text> </xsl:when> <xsl:when test="'${status}'='1'"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Job Failed</xsl:text> </xsl:when> <xsl:when test="'${status}'='2'"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Job Canceled</xsl:text> </xsl:when> <xsl:when test="'${status}'='3'"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Job Aborted</xsl:text> </xsl:when> <xsl:when test="'${status}'='4'"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Job Deleted</xsl:text> </xsl:when> <xsl:when test="'${status}'='5'"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Job Schedule Expired</xsl:text> </xsl:when> </xsl:choose> </xsl:variable> <xsl:value-of select="substring($string-val, 1, 99)" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

documentation.description: Updates the Task ticket with job end result related information and closes or cancels the ticket based on whether the job was successfully completed / Aborted / Cancelled.
